title: Virtual Reality-Based Advanced Chemistry Experiment Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: University-Level Foundational Chemistry Theory and Laboratory Experience
context.additional_context: A graduate-level chemistry lab education course supplemented with VR technology, emphasizing integration with actual laboratory environments.

learning_goals: Learners can perform key experimental procedures (measurement, reaction observation, data recording) with 90% accuracy via 360-degree chemistry lab simulations in VR.
Learners can identify and explain three similarities and differences by comparing VR experiment results with actual lab data.
Learners master all five core safety protocols at 100% proficiency through VR-based formative assessments (quizzes, interactive problems).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
